# cmccloudv2_ecs_group (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get ecs group by id
data "cmccloudv2_ecs_group" "ecs_group_1" {  
    ecs_group_id = "07d7eb8f-62ae-4751-968a-3955ef0a6974"
}

# get ecs group by name
data "cmccloudv2_ecs_group" "ecs_group_1" {  
    name = "ecs-group-hfy8"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `ecs_group_id` (String) Id of the ecsgroup
- `name` (String) Filter by name of ecsgroup (case-insenitive)
- `policy` (String) filter by policy type

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
